title: International Jet Set
greeting: Good evening ladies and gentlemen. This is your captain speaking. Welcome aboard DC-10 flight number 1313 We will be cruising at a height of 35, 000 feet at an air speed of 600 miles per hour. Headphones will be provided by request for a varied program of in flight music Have a good flight
departure: You will depart from New York, Miami, or Los Angeles.
destinations: Zurich, Berlin, Monteeal, Minsk, Moscow, Cape Town
